teaser:
We have a wonderful opportunity for an evening nurse looking for full or part-time hours in the northern Minneapolis area. Our client is an adorable and interactive, 16 month old boy whose smile lights up the room. He is trach and ventilator dependent and is in need of an experienced pediatric nurse. Shifts available include Monday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday evenings from 3 pm to 11 pm.

Clinical responsibilities include adhering to the established client care plan and specific duties: administration of medication treatments, monitoring of clients condition, as well as understanding and following safety and infection control policies and practices.

We are looking for RNs and LPNs with at least 1 year of nursing experience to provide excellent care to this client in need. We offer extensive pediatric, trach, and vent training and orientation to this case.

Come work for an organization where you will be rewarded for your hard work and excellence, and be treated with respect and appreciation. Active nursing license and one year experience are required.

Join one of the nationâ€™s leading home care companies, apply today!

To learn more about this opportunity, please contact Aubrey Wisen at 952-935-5581 or MNP-team@bayada.com.

Founded in 1975 by J. Mark Baiada, BAYADA Home Health Care provides nursing, rehabilitative, therapeutic, hospice, and assistive care services to children, adults, and seniors in the comfort of their homes. Headquartered in suburban Philadelphia, BAYADA employs more than 18,000 nurses, home health aides, therapists, medical social workers, and other home health care professionals who serve their communities in 25 states from more than 250 offices. For more information, visit www.bayada.com . We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE).
jobtitle: RN or LPN Needed Immediately for Pediatric Home Care
